a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD18SHib3DosesLogic (IMMZ.D18.S.Hib.3 doses schedule) * Schedule Table: 3 primary doses without a booster dose (3p) schedule */ library IMMZD18SHib3DosesLogic

def.name: Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) dose 1 Expiration

a:t.name: dynamicValue
a:t.value: Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) dose 1 Expiration

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" + 6 years

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) dose 1

a:t.name: description
a:t.value: Provision of the Hib dose 1

a:t.name: trigger
a:t.value: Child's birth

a:t.name: triggerDate
a:t.value: "Date of birth"

def.name: Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) dose 1 Create

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) dose 1 Create

a:t.name: create
a:t.value: Immunization should start from 6 weeks of age, or as early as possible thereafter. Hib-containing vaccine is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years.

a:s.a:s: 'Immunization should start from 6 weeks of age, or as early as possible thereafter. Hib-containing vaccine is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years.'

def.name: First Hib dose from the primary series was administered

a:t.name: complete
a:t.value: First Hib dose from the primary series was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose"= "Primary series") = 1

a:s.a:s: "One Hib primary series dose was administered"

expression.name: One Hib primary series dose was administered

def.name: Second Hib dose from the primary series was administered

a:t.name: complete
a:t.value: Second Hib dose from the primary series was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose"= "Primary series") = 2

a:s.a:s: "Two Hib primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: Two Hib primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: dynamicValue
a:t.value: Hib dose 2 Expiration

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" + 6 years

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hib dose 2

a:t.name: description
a:t.value: Provision of the Hib dose 2

a:t.name: trigger
a:t.value: First Hib dose from the primary series was administered to the client within 1 year of age. Client's age is less than 5 years

a:t.name: pseudo
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1 AND "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type"= "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Dose number" = 1) − "Date of birth" < 1 year AND Today's date − "Date of birth" ≤ 5 years

a:t.name: triggerDate
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")

a:s.a:s: "First Hib dose from the primary series was administered"
"Client's age was less than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered"
"Client's age is between 6 weeks and 5 years"
"Second Hib dose from the primary series was administered"

a:t.value: Hib dose 2 Due Date

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines") + 4 weeks

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hib dose 2 Create

a:t.name: create
a:t.value: Hib dose 2 should be provided if the client was given the previous dose more than 4 weeks ago and the first Hib dose was received by the time the child turned 1 year old
